001package game;
002
003import java.util.List;
004import java.util.Stack;
005
006/**
007 * Player class - a player in an adventure game.
008 *@author Christophe TARATIBU
009 *@version 2025/2026 (09.01.2026)
010 */
011public class Player {
012    /** Current Room */
013    private Room aCurrentRoom;
014    /** List of player's items */
015    private final ItemList aPlayerItems;
016    /** Max weight of player's inventory */
017    private int aMaxWeight;
018    /** Stack of previous rooms */
019    private final Stack<Room> aPreviouRooms;
020    /** Current weight of players inventory */
021    private int aCurrentWeight;
022    /** Player's name */
023    private final String aName;
024    /** Room of the planted kunai (weapon used by ninjas) */
025    private Room aPlantedRoom;
026    /**
027    * Initialization of a player
028    * @param pName The name of the player
029    */
030    public Player(final String pName){
031        this.aName = pName;
032        this.aPlayerItems = new ItemList();
033        this.aPreviouRooms = new Stack<>();
034        this.aCurrentWeight = 0;
035        this.aMaxWeight = 15;
036        //this.aNumberOfMoves = 0;
037        this.aCurrentRoom = null;
038        this.aPlantedRoom = null;
039    }
040
041    /**
042     * Gives the name of the player
043     * @return The name of the player
044     */
045    public String getName(){
046        return this.aName;
047    }
048    /**
049     * Adds a previous room to the stack of previous rooms
050     * @param pRoom The previous room to add
051     */
052    public void addPreviousRoom(final Room pRoom){
053        this.aPreviouRooms.push(pRoom);
054    }
055    /**
056     * Sets the current room of the player
057     * @param pRoom The current room of the player
058     */
059    public void setCurrentRoom(final Room pRoom){
060        this.aCurrentRoom = pRoom;
061    }   
062    /**
063     * Gives the current room of the player
064     * @return The current room of the player
065     */
066    public Room getCurrentRoom(){
067        return this.aCurrentRoom;
068    }
069    
070
071    /**
072     * Gives the previous room of the player
073     * @return The previous room of the player
074     */
075    public Room getPreviousRoom(){
076        if(!this.aPreviouRooms.isEmpty()){
077            return this.aPreviouRooms.pop();
078        }
079        else{
080            return null;
081        }
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Sets the current weight of the player
086     * @param pWeight The current weight of the player
087     */
088    public void setWeight(int pWeight){
089        this.aCurrentWeight = pWeight;
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * Gives the current weight of the player
094     * @return The current weight of the player
095     */
096    public int getWeight(){
097        return this.aCurrentWeight;
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Gives the maximum weight the player can carry
102     * @return The maximum weight the player can carry
103     */
104    public int getMaxWeight(){
105        return this.aMaxWeight;
106    }
107
108    /**
109     * Get an item by its name
110     * @param pName Name of the item
111     * @return An item
112     */
113    public Item getItem(final String pName){
114        return this.aPlayerItems.getItem(pName);
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * Add an item in the player's item list
119     * @param pName Name of the item
120     * @param pItem Item
121     */
122    public void addItem(final String pName, final Item pItem){
123        this.aPlayerItems.addItem(pName, pItem);
124    }
125
126    /**
127     * Remove an item by its name
128     * @param pName Name of the item
129     */
130    public void removeItem(final String pName){
131        this.aPlayerItems.removeItem(pName);
132    }
133
134    /**
135     * List item names in player's inventory
136     * @return array of item names
137     */
138    public List<String> getInventoryItemNames(){
139        return this.aPlayerItems.getItemNames();
140    }
141    /**
142     * Whether the player's inventory is empty
143     * @return true if empty
144     */
145    public boolean isInventoryEmpty(){
146        return this.aPlayerItems.isEmpty();
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * Activate super power to double the max weight
151     */
152    public void superPower(){
153        this.aMaxWeight *= 2;
154    } 
155
156    /**
157     * Empty the player's inventory
158     */
159    public void emptyInventory(){
160        this.aPlayerItems.getItemsMap().clear();
161    }
162
163    /**
164     * Empty the previous rooms stack
165     */
166    public void emptyPreviousRooms(){
167        this.aPreviouRooms.clear();
168    }
169    
170
171    /**
172     * Get all items in player's inventory
173     * @return A string listing all items
174     */
175    public String getItems(){
176        return "Items: "  + String.join(", ", this.aPlayerItems.getItemNames());
177    }
178
179    /**
180     * Get the planted room
181     * @return The planted room
182     */
183    public Room getPlantedRoom(){
184        return this.aPlantedRoom;
185    }
186
187    /**
188     * Set the planted room
189     * @param pRoom The planted room
190     */
191    public void setPlantedRoom(final Room pRoom){
192        this.aPlantedRoom = pRoom;
193    }
194
195    /**
196     * reset the planted room to null
197     */
198    public void resetPlantedRoom(){
199        this.aPlantedRoom = null;
200    }
201    
202}
